wadimahal diyaniyata samajaya idiriye ella wi thibu kathandara ganath wadi awadhanayak pashchath marana pararikshanayedi yomu wuna athara  dariyata miya yanathek kisidu athawarayak siduwi nomathi bawa ehidi thahawuru wuna.priyantha thama padinchiwa siti senehabara kadallatada gini thaba surathalayata athi kala sunakhaya da lindata dama mara mema aparadhaya sidukara thibuna athara  geta gini thabimata pera budupilima, buddha rupa ha dewa rupa pitathata genawith thaba thibuna.siyalla sidu wi awasanaye mawata kumak wida yanna wishala kathabahak athiwuye aya mala gedarata ho in pasuwa nopamini nisayi.loku putha wu  sudaththa himiyan ekala hiru wetha kiya sitiye thamata amma soya ganimata awashya bawayi.kesewethath pasugiya 26 mawa thaman samaga kambaurupitiya polisiya wetha gos prakashayak dun bawa ada(28) sudaththa himiyan hiru wetha sandahan kala.wartha wana andamata shriyani prakasha kara aththe mewannak."aarthika prashnath ekka pawule aarawul athi wuna.
